author: Simon Difford
description: Coffee and orange spiked with tequila. The trio layer well and combine to make a tasty shot (perhaps stir together and sip to savour the experience rather than downing in one).
name: Alice From Dallas
recipeIngredient: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: Refrigerate ingredients then LAYER in chilled glass by carefully pouring in the following order
